title: Animal Crossing, wobbly leaves, pivot caching.

media:group.media:title: Animal Crossing, wobbly leaves, pivot caching.
media:group.media:description:
In this video I reverse engineer the lovely wobbly leafy trees of Animal Crossing: New Horizons using a technique called Pivot Caching.

References:
https://www.geeks3d.com/20141201/how-to-rotate-a-vertex-by-a-quaternion-in-glsl/?fbclid=IwAR3k347hpiyblLTohmZTZnk_tbawsaXbiUewbaSSujV6WzBqhylS7fNIQFI
